info.name: Shortest Noise - 75 chars
info.description:
As I've been experimenting with small noise functions, I found this.
I doubt this is original, but I would love to know how this stacks up against other noise functions.

renderpass.code:
void mainImage(out vec4 o,vec2 u) {
    o = fract( tan(dot(u,u) / u.x+iTime) * u.xxxx); }
renderpass.name: Image
